participant_1.background:
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I like to organize my home and surroundings to keep busy on the weekends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I am not rich, but I am working hard to achieve my financial goals.

participant_2.background:
I am from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read.
I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.
i enjoy watching horror flicks.
I love having my laptop with me wherever I go.

content.text: Hi there! I'm from a small town too. Do you miss it?
Hey! Yes and no. I loved the woods behind my house, but I don't miss the small town mentality.
I know what you mean. I miss the peace and quiet sometimes.
Yes, I love to! I have a rocking chair and I read to my kids in there.
That sounds really relaxing. I love to watch horror flicks. Do you like to watch movies?
I do! I love action and comedies. I'm not a big fan of horror, but my kids love it.
I love to have my laptop with me wherever I go. What's your favorite thing to do with yours?
I love to watch YouTube videos and do research. I also use it for work.
Work? What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm also a Zumba instructor.
That's awesome! I love Zumba. I need to get back into it.
You should! It's a great way to get in shape and have fun.
I'm going to start going again as soon as the weather warms up.
I hope we can meet up for a class sometime!
